transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji good morning sir, Mahesh Fabricators and Engineering mein baat ho rahi hai?

Customer: Mahesh Fabricators mein baat ho rahi hai sir?

Executive: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Aditya baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke office se kaise hain?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Aapki kal discussion hui thi aapke account manager ke sath shaam mein but uske baad ek feedback diya gaya tha negative feedback ki not satisfied hai unke calls se aisa kya hai jaan sakta hu sir?

Customer: Nahi aisa jyada kuch nahi matlab theek se mujhe information nahi mili.

Customer: Unko bol raha tha main to unhone theek se mujhe information nahi di koi isliye I was not satisfied sir.

Executive: Isiliye jaisa main isme dekh raha tha aaj aap logo ne video meet ke regarding discussion kiya tha shaam mein video meet karenge service use ke regarding.

Customer: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Haan kyunki dekhiye jyada time nahi hua hai abhi catalog agar dekha jaaye sir to apna ek se do mahine hue hai ise start hue ek mahina hua hai aaj hardly.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: To isse aap use bhi nahi kar rahe zero hai to aaj aap log shaam mein video meet kar lijiye wo aapko uses ka aur client identification sari cheeze wo bata denge.

Customer: Main unse bol raha tha ki wo nahi nahi mujhe lag raha tha ki aapke yahan se ek list provide hogi ki kaun se customer hamare liye useable hai main unse puch raha tha ki kya hoga list hogi ya kuch hogi.

Customer: To wo mujhse chilla kar baat kar rahi thi ki leads ya kuch aur wo usse pehle wo aise humse baat nahi kar rahi thi jab chal raha tha jab hum kya bol rahe the jab shuruwat ki tab aise nahi baat kar rahi thi.

Customer: Mujhe bas wo tone aur wo unhone wo samjha rahi thi shayad unka koi aur kaam chal raha hoga.

Customer: Wo unse main puch raha tha aur wo aadhe ki way mein baat kar rahi thi.

Executive: Theek hai isliye unko bola ki maine aapse dheere baat kariye.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Nahi to main bata dunga unko jaisa ho sakta hai ki unka thoda fast fast keh rahe ho to us wajah se problem aa rahi hai main bolta hu bata dunga aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha tha isliye unko puch raha tha.

Executive: Ji kya hoga basically pehle inse baat hui thi waha par hum aapke liye hum enquiries laayenge jaise aapke yahan se bola gaya tha.

Customer: Ji sir.

Executive: Bola gaya tha ya wo confirm karke boliye mujhe.

Customer: Sir aapko bol raha tha main.

Executive: Haan haan.

Customer: Par wo bol rahi thi mujhe hamara ye kaam hi nahi hai hum kyun provide karenge ya kuch aur bol rahi thi.

Executive: Lead dekhiye isme agar thoda bahut hota hai na jaise ki hame problem aati hai agar service mein to inke do char panch leads hua ki haan account manager aapko bhej dete hain.

Executive: Itna kara sakte hain baki aap boliyega agar ki ji haan chaliye ki hame portal pe leads nahi mil rahi hain to main account manager ko bol dunga kuch leads shortlist karke unki details aapko bhej denge whatsapp pe.

Customer: Haan haan wahi bol raha tha main unko ki kuch enquiries nahi aa rahi thi.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Fir wo mujhe kya boli ki wo photos aur PDF bhej do.

Customer: Maine kaha PDF aur photos bhej dunga aapko.

Executive: Haan bhej dijiye.

Customer: Wo bol rahi thi ki Google meet pe hum kal karenge aur fir waha pe aapko dikhayenge.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Lekin wahi aapko bola na pichli baar abhi wahi mujhe thoda ye ho gaya.

Executive: Nahi tum ek kaam kar lenge na jo video meet hum schedule karenge na fir shaam mein usme main bhi join ho jaunga to uske liye tension free rahiye agar waisa kuch galat hua galat to nahi kaha kiya jayega sir leads ka jo problem hoga.

Customer: Nahi unko kya bol raha hai aaj humne join kiye hue kuch mahine ho gaye.

Customer: Aur fir hame enquiries aa rahi hai wo bhi kaise aa rahi hai wo Kolhapur ka ek customer aaya tha hame chahiye bulk mein quantity bulk mein matlab kitna 1 lakh 1 lakh aur 1 lakh.

Executive: Haan wo bhi chote chote chote chote product kam se kam 50000 bhi rahe to apna kaam nikal sakta hai kam se kam.

Customer: Kam se kam lekin wo kya ho raha hai ki wo 50000 15000 10000 ke order aa rahe hai uske liye hame samples banana pad raha hai hamare already dusre project chalu hai ye market ka project matlab bahar ke sab wo Pune ke yahan ke.

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Fir wo kya ho raha hai ki wo unke sample banane ke liye setting sab change karna pad raha hai aur usme bahut time jata hai.

Executive: Usme time jata hai aur thoda quantity mein.

Customer: Quantity mein thoda quantity mein kuch hamara loss nahi hai.

Executive: Ji sir to isme main aapka dekh raha tha jitne bhi product dale hai na apne hamare total 21 hai un sab pe minimum order quantity 2000 dala hua hai sir.

Customer: Wo change karne ke liye are hum hame jab tha to aapko kyun bolte hum.

Executive: Ji sir nahi wo main dekh liya wo 2000 hai wo account manager ko main bol deta hu use main 50000 pe karwa deta hu sir aur pichli baar jab unse baat nahi hui thi koi aur aadmi tha jo hamara create kar raha tha.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Yes sir.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai sir?

Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai kya? Haan aa rahi hai clearly aa rahi hai please boliye.

Customer: Haan haan haan pichli baar jab hamara jo account create kar raha tha unko maine bola tha ki photos wagera kuch dalu kya to unhone kya bola tha mujhe ki hum hamari yahan se photos dalenge aur wo mam kal mujhe kya bol rahi thi ki aapne profile complete karne ko bola tha wo bhi nahi kiya.

Executive: To aapne wo jab service liya tha na aapne haan haan jab service liya tha aapne ek production team ne alag se call kiya hoga aapko.

Customer: Haan to unko maine photo dalo dalta hu isliye bhi maine bola tha to wo bole jarurat nahi hai hum hamare yahan se banakar bhej denge.

Executive: Haan nahi to ye main kara de raha hu jaise abhi dekhiye sir kuch hi products mein kami aa rahi hai aisa nahi.

Customer: Wo bol rahi hai bol rahi thi aise aur aise.

Executive: Nahi dekhiye photos isme already sab mein added hai aisa nahi hai ki kisi mein missing hai sirf ek product mein hai to wo main abhi hi dalwa de raha hu.

Customer: Nahi abhi turant dal jayega jab profile create kar rahe the na tabhi photo nikal kar rakhe the aur unko bol raha tha main wo sir the kaun photo bhej du kya to wo bole hamare yahan se hum online acche photo dal denge aapki profile.

Executive: Online khud se hi haan haan haan haan.

Executive: To wo to sab mein dal diya gaya hai sir agar aap check karenge to haan wo dal diye na fir wo bol rahi hai mam ki aapne photo bhi nahi dale matlab wo kuch products pe jinpe missing hai na haan nahi kuch pe sab pe nahi wo ho sakta hai unko knowledge nahi ho main bata dunga inko abhi jinpe missing hai na abhi kya bol raha tha abhi kya kya requirement hai wo mujhe bolo main unse aapko bhej deta hu.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Aur unko bol raha tha ki aapke yahan se kya kya ho sakta hai haan mujhe wo bol rahi thi leads hum provide karenge mujhe laga list isliye main bola list.

Executive: List nahi lead lead lead list nahi sir lead.

Customer: Haan isliye mujhe laga list bol rahi hai isliye main pucha ki kya kya matlab to bol rahi hai hamara wo kaam hi nahi hai hum wo kyun karenge.

Executive: Nahi nahi wo thoda sa miscommunication ho gaya hoga sir wo ho sakta hai ki bolne mein haan isliye mujhe jyada ye aaya ki hum aise hum customer hai aur hamare sath aise baat karenge kya.

Executive: Nahi nahi waisa nahi hai sir wo confusion ho gaya hoga ho sakta hai ki shabdo ka hota hai to wo aage se nahi hoga iska main dhyan rakhunga aaj bhi shaam mein jo discussion hogi na service uses ke regarding usme main bhi add ho jaunga agar kahin kuch doubt fasegi to wo main clear kar dunga sir uske liye tension free rahiye aap mera bhi number save kar lijiyega main aapke account manager ka senior hu agar unke taraf se koi bhi aapko point ki clear hoti hai ya koi problem aati hai to aap direct mujhse bhi connect kar sakte hain sir.

Customer: Theek hai sir aapka naam kya hai?

Executive: Aditya.

Customer: Aditya theek hai sir thank you sir aap number save kar lijiyega whatsapp pe bhi yahi number hai agar call nahi bhi karte kahin busy hai to ek message dal dijiyega main usse turant dekh lunga turant use resolution de dunga theek hai theek hai theek hai.

Executive: And ye bol raha tha ye jo complaint tha na sir negative feedback ka ye main close kar de raha hu abhi aapke paas ek mere feedback ka aayega mail fir se to uspe satisfied de dijiyega.

Customer: Theek hai sir.

Executive: Haan uspe please wo mere call ka jayega to uska please de dijiyega.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received unsatisfactory service from account manager.

- Wants a list of usable customers.

- Enquiries received are for small order quantities.

- Photos not uploaded to the profile.



Resolution:

- Executive will join the video meet.

- Executive will increase minimum order quantity to 50000.

- Executive will add missing photos to the profile.

- Executive shared his contact number for direct communication.

- Executive will close the negative feedback complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide satisfied feedback on executive's call.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, minimum order quantity, photos, feedback
